item.description: Elise is a senior Intercultural Studies major at Olivet Nazarene University from Oak Lawn, IL. She is serving LoopNaz as part of her cross-cultural field studies coursework.
Reuben is a musician, theologian, and philosopher serving as pastor and chairperson of the Loop Church of the Nazarene and Compassionate Ministries in Chicago.
